unnormalised: Arre yaar, kiteak soglle zonn taka "Mr." mhonn ulo kortat? To fokot 20 vorsancho asa, taka "bhai" mhonn tori ulo kor! "Beta" mhonnlearui borem dista, lol.
normalised: Arre yaar, kiteak soglle zann taka "Mister" mhonnun ulo kortat? To fokot vis vorsancho asa, taka "bhai" mhonnun tori ulo kor! "Beta" mhonnun tori bore dista, L-O-L.
